name: Echo (itch) (rwitmayer)
description: Echo is 2D top down game where you are tasked with shooting enemies that are homing in on your location. Upon defeating them, you are able t ocollect chorus orbs that fill your meter and unlock more layers of the background track. Once you fill the meter to 100 percent, you can collect the tone of a given level and restore music to the world! Let me know what your favorite song is and anything you do or don't enjoy.
